about_the_game:
Play in Top Down perspective to target enemies all around you, OR


seamlessly switch to FPS perspective to focus your firepower in front of you!


The Zions have enslaved the super powers of the world, but somehow a few Arabian freedom fighters are holding out against the invaders! Waves of enemies will attack you and in this horde survival game it is their bullets and mines that you need to avoid. There are twenty waves and you need to defeat all enemies in each wave, and in between waves you buy weapons and upgrades to become more and more powerful. You can press the Tab key to seamlessly switch between top down mode or FPS mode. In FPS mode your firing is directed ahead of you making it an easy way to focus your firepower and you can jump to better avoid enemy projectiles.

  • Defeat 20 waves of enemies and buy new weapons and upgrades between waves.
  • Satisfying ragdoll physics.
  • Seamless switching between top down and FPS perspectives, play how you like.
  • Five player characters to unlock.
  • Five levels to conquer.
  • Twenty weapons to unlock; pistols, rifles, SMGs, RPG, mines, etc!
  • Plenty of meta progression to sink all that money into and become more powerful!
  • Relics that will help boost your character in some aspects but weaken them in others!
  • Plenty of Steam achievements to earn!

content_descriptors.notes: Low poly violence. Ragdolls thrown about.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: Both Apple Silicon and Intel chipsets are supported.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities. Apple Silicon inbuilt graphics works fine.
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

short_description: Take the role of an Arabian freedom fighter defending against the hordes of Zion who have enslaved the super powers of the world! Seamlessly play top down or FPS. Defeat all 20 waves to win! Upgrade your weapons and abilities between waves to become powerful.
